ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] 55 Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: I was under the impression that it regens mana, health, and stamina.  Stacks with CCC and clarity/clarity2. ... From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) To:
ygData.messageBody:
I was under the impression that it regens mana, health, and stamina. Stacks with CCC and clarity/clarity2.
----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Sent: Thursday, May 03, 2001 4:39 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] 55 Songs


Only the health.

Shada Iceheart [Retired]
<Afterlife>

> I am about to ding 55, I am curious about the Cantana of
> Replenishment. What does a stringed intstument do for it?
> Increase the health, mana or both? Does anyone have any
> quantative numbers?
